title: Ultrathin single-ion sieving membrane with sub-1-nm channels for suppressing Li dendrite growth and polysulfide shuttling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02038C, Paper
Rongrong Li, Yichi Wang, Jingmin Zhang, Jun Yang, Jiang He, Wenjie Mai, Xiong Pu
Inspired by biomimetic channels, we construct a single-ion sieving membrane to suppress Li dendrite growth and polysulfide shuttling via synergizing sub-1-nm channel's size effect and charge effect.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
